sentence.Network_en: I will not be cowed into forsaking my beliefs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会因为被恐吓而放弃自己的信仰.

sentence.Network_en: At fourteen he ran away, forsaking his home and friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 他十四岁出走, 离开了家乡和朋友.

sentence.Network_en: Aragorn pendant You said you'd bind yourself to me. Forsaking the immortal life of your people.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚拉冈:我记得你说你愿意嫁给我, 放弃精灵长生不死的力量.

PerfectNetExp.abs: i will not be cowed into forsaking my beliefs ., 我不会因威吓而放弃自己的信仰的.
it is not I who disturb Israel , " he answered , " but you and your family , by forsaking the commands of the LORD and following the Baals .厄里亚答说：“不是我叫以色列遭难，而是你和你的父家，因为你们抛弃了上主的诫命，归顺了巴耳邪神。”
forsaking worldly pomp for the life of a monk ., 摒弃世间的浮华而出家.

list.abs: 抛空 English, 翻译,... ... 抛费 to squander;to waste 抛离 to leave;to forsake;to desert 抛脸 to lose face;humiliation.
she pleaded with her husband not to forsake her ., 她乞求丈夫不要抛弃她.
gods forsake me , i forsake him ., 上帝抛弃了我 , 我就抛弃他.
I will not be cowed into forsaking my beliefs .我不会因为被恐吓而放弃自己的信仰。
I will never forget you , I will never forsake you .我永远不会忘记你，我永远不会抛弃你。
but along with the marching orders , the Lord gave him an assuring promise : " I will not leave you nor forsake you " ( Josh . 1 : 5 ) .然而，上帝在下达行军命令时，也给了他信心与应许：「我必不撇下你，也不丢弃你」（约书亚记1章5节)。

entry.def: If you forsake someone, you leave them when you should have stayed, or you stop helping them or looking after them.

example.ex: I still love him and I would never forsake him.
example.tran: 我仍然爱着他,我永远不会离他而去。

example.ex: ...children who've been forsaken by individual teachers...
example.tran: 已经被个别教师弃之不顾的孩子们

entry.def: If you forsake something, you stop doing it, using it, or having it.

example.ex: He doubted their claim to have forsaken military solutions to the civil war...
example.tran: 他对他们声称已经放弃通过武力解决内战感到怀疑。

example.ex: But that didn't make her forsake her ideals...
example.tran: 但是那并未使她放弃她的理想。

entry.def: If you forsake a place or a thing, you leave it or go away from it.

example.ex: At 53 he has no plans to forsake the hills.
example.tran: 53 岁的他还没有打算离开这些山丘。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of giving something up
